channel.title: [solved] How to set number of voices of polyphonic subpatch?
channel.description:
I see online various references to setting the number of voices for a subpatch, however I can't find any setting like that. Does it exist, and if so, where?
Edit: never mind, I forgot to set the subpatch to poly in its settings.
